description:
Has trail markers indicating it is part of the trans-canada trail. First 2/3 follow ridge in nice forest. Last 1/3 is walk along logging roads in clear cut. (don't believe out-of-date google earth imagery)
Lake is good for a picnic and a swim.
directions: Turn onto spruston road from the island highway and watch for signs of trail head at large turn out.
title: Spruston Road to Timberland Lake
